text_block_list.text: ――The day of the 『American Oaks』

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
(Are they here yet? 
They're not here yet. Still……!)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
(Geez! That blockhead, just what are they doing? 
To think they'd only make it on the day of)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
King-san, I'll be……fine. 
I'm fine……so……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
You don't seem fine at all…… Anyways, just try to calm down 
for now. It'll be soon. I'm sure Trainer will be here soon.

There had been an unexpected delay in my flight. Still, 
I was on my way to America, where Cesario was waiting.

Haa, haa, haa…… I didn't think it'd take so long to get 
through the immigration checkpoint…… Wait for me, Cesario!

Haa, haa, haa…… I didn't think it'd take so long to get 
through the immigration checkpoint…… Wait for me, Cesario!

Haa, haa, haa…… Almost there……! 
I need to take everything I brought with me――to Cesario!

I can see it! The race track! 
I hope I still have time――
Cesario!! King!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Ah……Trainer……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Aren't you super late, geez～!!!!!

Looks like I barely made it. With my arrival, 
I could practically feel the heavy atmosphere dissipate.
Let's start a strategy meeting right away!
Let's start a strategy meeting right away!

To start, I wanted to explain our strategy for the 
『American Oaks』. And then, one by one, I explained 
the things I had learned from my fellow trainers.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I see…… It's all things I didn't know. 
Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I was sure I had the basics down but…… but compared to 
those with experience, it's completely different, isn't it?

Yeah, and next, about the corners. On this course they have 
a bit of an angle so don't let that throw off your senses.

Yeah, and next, about the corners. On this course they have 
a bit of an angle so don't let that throw off your senses.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's true, the centrifugal force will change 
how fast it feels like I'm going…… Understood, 
it was something I didn't account for.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's amazing, to even cover small details like that……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Well then, Trainer, King-san. I'll be heading out now.

Yeah, and lastly, I want to share something from 
last year's experience. It's regarding the pace……

Yeah, and lastly, I want to share something from 
last year's experience. It's regarding the pace……

I see…… America has a large amount of dirt races. 
So I had the impression that their starts would be quick……

But since there's a difference between that and 
grass, there are times when the pace is a bit slower? 
So that's why, in last year's 『American Oaks』……

But since there's a difference between that and 
grass, there are times when the pace is a bit slower? 
So that's why, in last year's 『American Oaks』……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
We weren't able to adjust to the strangely slow 
pace so we ended up losing…… In that case……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
There's something I want you to tell Cesario-san! 
『If the pace is slow, there's no reason to worry』!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry if it's slow…… 
Special Week-san……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It's not just Kraft. It seems like 
everyone is cheering me on, doesn't it?

That's right. Actually, Special Week isn't 
the only one that had a message for you.

That's right. Actually, Special Week isn't 
the only one that had a message for you.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
I had wanted to take on America too. I guess I'll let 
you take on the Symboli founder's dream for now, Cesario.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Once, a Mejiro Uma Musume known as the "swordsman" 
tried and fell short. Cesario-san, I'd like to ask 
you to help clear that lingering regret.

text_block_list.name: Seeking The Pearl
text_block_list.text:
Hoo Ho Ho Ho! If you're able to win, 
that would make us World Class buddies, Cesario!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Cesario, there are many Uma Musume, and many who 
support them. And now――you've made it this far.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
――Now and forever. Run with your head held high. Even if 
you can't see them, there are many things you have gained.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Everyone…… The things I've gained, even if I can't see them……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(That's right. There have been so many Uma Musume aiming for 
this. If I am also part of that grand flow of emotions……)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Then there's nothing to fear. This flow created 
by my senpais, I just need to ride it myself……)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: (Which means, what I should be doing in this place is……)

Cesario, even if we're overseas, 
there's no need to match their pace.
choice_data_list: Just run your own way, as you are!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
――Yes! I stand on the shoulders of history built 
by those who challenged before. Which means……

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I just need to push forward, with all my might. 
Following this flow――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Cesario-san! Do your best!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yes! Trainer, King-san.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(From those that came before, to those that came after. 
This river……I'll be the one to expand it. Without fail)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(The 『American Oaks』. I'll carve it 
in to this stage. My――proof of existence)
